channel.title: Need Help will pay rs2 cash!
channel.description: Hey my mate just sent me a server and wen i click runserver.bat it ses 'java' is not a reconised file or sumthing like that and compile.bat wont work either can sum plz help me !. :( .. oh and any other help wulb be appreciated cose i have never had a server b4 and i dnt no much about coding and wateva u need to do :P

item.title: Need Help will pay rs2 cash!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Download JDK 1.6.0u1 and then edit your runserver.bat and replace everything in it with this:

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help will pay rs2 cash!
